Class Chess

java.lang.Object
Chess
public class Chess extends Object
Implements all the moves for the Chess game
Author:
Deep Shah, Aryaman Patel

      public static void main(String[] args)

    • drawBoard

      public static void drawBoard()
      Draws the whole board on the terminal and puts the chess pieces

    • coordinateFile

      public static int coordinateFile(String file)
      Method to Coordinate the file
      Parameters:
      file - : a String representing the name of the file to be coordinated.
      Returns:
      int: An integer value representing the coordinate of the file. The value is calculated based on the lowercase first letter of the file name.

    • coordinateRank

      public static int coordinateRank(String file)
      Method to Rank the file
      Parameters:
      file - : a String representing the name of the file to be ranked.
      Returns:
      int: An integer value representing the rank of the file. The value is calculated based on the second character of the file name, which should be a number from 1 to 8.

    • legalInput

      public static boolean legalInput(int x1, int x2, int x3, int x4)
      Checks if the input is legal or not
      Parameters:
      x1 - , x2, x3, x4: integer values representing coordinates to test if the input is within range.
      Returns:
      boolean: A boolean value indicating whether the input coordinates are legal or not. The method checks if each of the four integer values is between 0 and 7 (inclusive). If all four values are within this range, the method returns true; otherwise, it returns false.

    • parseInput

      public static void parseInput(String input)
      computes if the player won when other player resigns or if there is a draw, also checks for any invalid inputs
      Parameters:
      input - : a String representing the user input to be parsed.

    • executeMoveOld

      public static void executeMoveOld()
      checks for player moves and coordinates if it is allowed and if the spot is empty

    • pawnPromotion

      public static void pawnPromotion(int newx, int newy)
      method for promoting Pawn to Queen, Rook, Knight or Bishop when it reaches the last box
      Parameters:
      newX - , newY: an integer representing the x-coordinate, y-coordinate of the pawn's new position.

    • executeMove

      public static void executeMove()
      checks for pieces if they are moving correctly and prints error messages if not
